Vegan: 90% of animal calorie demand is met with plant calories.
Vegetarian: 75% of animal calorie demand is met with plant calories.
StopDevelopment: Stops regional development throughout the world.
EVs: Road vehicles use electricity instead of fuel and 4x more energy efficient
Electrified: 80% of fuel demand becomes electricity demand.
MetalsShortage: Infrastructure projects take 20% longer to finish.
Degrowth: Wealthy regions income levels and consumption will decline.
